mainHero.title: The Wedding Of
mainHero.subtitle: Agata & Thomas
mainHero.description: On June 28th, 2025, we will be celebrating our love in Bydgoszcz, at the stunning Boska Wenecja, located in the heart of the city. This website will provide you with all the information you need to join us as we begin this new chapter of our lives together. We can't wait to celebrate with all our family and friends.

items.title: Event space and restaurant
items.description: Nestled by the tranquil Młynówka River in Bydgoszcz, Boska Wenecja is a captivating venue that blends charm and versatility. It's the perfect setting for unforgettable weddings, lively concerts, and inspiring workshops. With cozy lodgings, artisanal dining, and even a craft brewery, it offers everything to delight your guests. Surrounded by stunning views of Wyspa Młyńska, Boska Wenecja promises not just an event but a magical experience, where every detail feels personal and inspired

items.title: Beer Museum
items.description: Located within the Wyspa Młyńska Brewery complex and the Warzelnia Piwa restaurant and pub, you will find an interactive beer museum. The museum offers using a unique opportunity to explore the history of brewing while also highlighting contemporary brewing practices in Poland. The Beer Museum, alongside the Beer Brewery, forms a key part of the TeH2O tourist route, celebrating the rich industrial and craft heritage of Bydgoszcz

accommodation.title: Bydgoszcz
accommodation.subtitle: Hotels & Accomodation
accommodation.description: Bydgoszcz has plenty of places to stay, whether you're looking for something sleek and modern or a more intimate, homey vibe. Below, you'll find a selection of hotels located near the city center, close to the wedding venue, making it easy to explore Bydgoszcz while staying close to all the action.

items.name: Rezydencja Sowa
items.description: Sowa Residence in Bydgoszcz is located in the heart of the Old Town, in the immediate vicinity of the most notable monuments of the city and the banks of the Brda River. Housed in a renovated historic building, the property offers a restaurant, confectionery, relaxation and conference areas.

items.name: La Mare Housebouts
items.description: Dom Na Wodzie La Mare Houseboat offers a unique riverside retreat in the heart of Bydgoszcz, just steps from the Opera Nova Conference Centre and Town Hall. This air-conditioned floating apartment features two bedrooms, a cozy living room with a flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Guests can relax on the private balcony or terrace, enjoying stunning river views.

items.name: Holiday Inn Bydgoszcz
items.description: Holiday Inn Bydgoszcz is a 4-star riverside hotel in Bydgoszcz city centre, with the city's charming Old Town only a short stroll away.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.subTitle: Wishlist
gifts.description: We are so excited to be getting married, and the only thing that we ask for is your company. However, should you wish to give us anything, we request that you give us cards, memories, and a bloody good wedding! If anyone wishes to give us gifts, we would appreciate donations towards our honeymoon.

menu.title: Menu
menu.subTitle: Culinary Delights from Two Cultures
menu.description: We are thrilled to share with you a feast of modern Polish cuisine. Aditionally, we'll have some snacks from both Denmark and Poland, along with sparkling and non-sparkling wine, local craft beer and an assortment of sodas.

thingsToDo.title: Bydgoszcz
thingsToDo.subTitle: What to see and what to do
